replies.msg:
拋磚引玉，希望大家討論吓不同意見既成效

1. 短期內舉辦光復元朗行動

2. 搜集任何相關資料，包括但不限有關人仕個人資料，相關物業/店舖資料，活躍地點，行蹤等等

3. 透過海關，入境，警方，食環等等相關部門，清洗元朗黃賭毒產業鏈 ，烏煙瘴氣好多巴打覺得警黑合作，成效不大

4. 眾籌去聘請例如G4S/黑水等國際保安公司，保護各議員，知名人仕如陳伯，記者們，其他有需要市民等等好多巴打贊成呢個方案

5. 元朗放盤/退租，警黑合作，治安全無

6. 舉報僭建

7. 全民對抗新鴻基SHK運動

8. 而家鄉黑最搵錢嘅係貨櫃場同倉，要斷就要諗辦法斷米路

[集思廣益]發夢夢到殲滅元朗官商鄉黑計劃

The Law Society of Hong Kong
3rd Floor, Wing On House
71 Des Voeux Road Central

Hong Kong

Dear Sirs

Re: Complaint against Ho Kwan Yiu of Messrs. K.C. Ho & Fong
I am a citizen of Hong Kong.
I hold dear to the civil rights of every citizen, the video footage widely spread on the news and the social media showing the interaction between Mr. Ho Kwan Yiu and a few men in white (with red ribbon on the wrist holding sticks) on 21st July 2019 shortly after the brutal attack took place in Yuen Long should call for an investigation into Ho’s participation in the brutal attack in Yuen Long in any way. His connection with the triad society in Yuen Long is well known and his membership with the Law Society of Hong Kong is a disgrace to the Hong Kong.
Furthermore, the widely spread photo taken by Ho himself within the Court building also calls for an investigation on his breach of professional ethics and misconducts. Mr. Ho’s is the officer of the Court and a member of the Law Society of Hong Kong, his provocation of peace and inciting violence in public is totally unfit of a honourable citizen, let alone a member of your esteemed Society. His behaviour is blatantly ignoring the law and wilfully putting himself above the law. He should be subject to an investigation and a reprimand at the least.
I call for his removal from the Law Society of Hong Kong.
I shall be very grateful if this esteemed society will take this complaint seriously.


Yours faithfully


A Citizen

👆🏽Write and sign your name

Then email to Complaints@hklawsoc.org.hk
